suppressed.message: Non-text html elements should include a 'title' attribute for accessibility.

usage.message: 'img' or 'area' HTML element has no 'alt' attribute.
'input' HTML element is not referenced by a corresponding label element.

Navigation Document has no 'landmarks nav' element.
SVG hyperlinks should have a human-readable title (using the 'title' child element or the 'xlink:title' attribute).
Table elements should include a caption element.
Content file contains at least one inline style declaration.
Inline styles are not compatible with accessibility settings and display personalization. Use CSS Styles instead.

Acceptable values include percentages, em multiples, 'larger', 'smaller', 'normal' or 'inherit'.

Acceptable values include percentages, numeric multiples, em multiples, 'normal', or 'inherit'.

Acceptable values include percentages, em multiples, 'larger', 'smaller', 'normal' or 'inherit'.

Acceptable values include percentages, numeric multiples, em multiples, 'normal', or 'inherit'.

CSS property is declared !Important.

Acceptable values include 'caption', 'icon', 'menu', 'message-box', 'small-caption',  'status-bar', or 'inherit'.

CSS selector specifies media query.

Use of Font-face declaration.

Document may contain excessive DIV or SPAN tags.
Merge DIV or SPAN tags when they are consecutive and use the same style.
An XHTML Named Entity was found. Only '&' ''' '"e;' '<' or '>' are allowed.
Check the spelling or use numbered entities instead.
List contains less than 2 items.
Lists should have more than one item for accessibility.
Input html elements should include an id.
Label html elements should include a 'for' attribute referencing the id of an input element.
HTML 'head' element does not have a 'title' child element.
Ensure b, i, em, and strong elements are used in compliance with W3C HTML5 directives.
CSS styles are usually more appropriate for italics or bold text.
Namespace uri '%1$s' was included but not used.
Remove unused Namespace URIs.
Encountered empty href.
Empty hrefs are valid self-references.  These should be validated to ensure that this is the desired intent.

The Navigation Document should contain the full document heading hierarchy in EDUPUB.

Content documents contain 'table' elements but the Navigation Document does not have a listing of tables (epub:type='lot').
Content documents contain 'video' elements but the Navigation Document does not have a listing of video clips (epub:type='lov').

NCX identifier ('dtb:uid' metadata) should not contain leading or trailing whitespace.
